body_html: Agreed, stackoverflow is the best place for this question. Without seeing any code, my best guess is that you have captured a Python Tensor object created within a tf.while_loop and are attempting to use it outside the loop. The error message in such a case is not very helpful, but the basic problem is that the value you are trying to use is not well-defined: which iteration should it pick? What if the loop doesn't execute at all (the condition is initially false)?
